templates.name: ogc-proxy
templates.title: The proxy to bypass CORS
templates.description: The http used to bypass CORS when webmap calls GeoServer capabilities
templates.note: The PROXY Server will be deployed globally inside the cluster and available on port 80.

templates.name: webservers
templates.title: Nginx HTTP web server based services
templates.description: Includes the main http proxy and another instance for delivery static files.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory to provide the main proxy and delivery of files for download.

templates.name: apis
templates.title: Backend APIs.
templates.description: A collection of APIs for most backend services.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory to configure Dashboards, WebMap and WebSite Download list, in addition to providing middleware service for authentication and time series. This stack includes an instance of MongoDB and Redis to store and delivery the JSON documents.

templates.name: background-tasks
templates.title: Background tasks
templates.description: A collection of services as background tasks.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory to sync DETER data and prepare Dashboards cached files.

templates.name: mysql
templates.title: The MySQL SGDB and the WebClient PhpMyAdmin.
templates.description: The PhpMyAdmin App allows to manage the databases into any internal instance for MySQL.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory and is used for store and manage the databases of the WordPress such as TerraBrasilis Web site and another PHP web pages.

templates.name: manager-apps
templates.title: The Web Client manager Apps.
templates.description: The Apps to allow manage the resources like PostgreSQL databases.
templates.note: This stack is optional and serves to manage the resources on TerraBrasilis cluster.

templates.name: metadata-app
templates.title: The GeoNetwork app for managing metadata.
templates.description: The GeoNetwork application allows managing the metadata catalog and serving it through the WCS API.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory and serves to manage the metadata catalog for TerraBrasilis data.

templates.name: cluster-geoserver
templates.title: The GeoServer cluster to publish data compliant with the OGC services standard.
templates.description: The GeoServer application allows managing data sources and making them available through the OGC API as WMS and WFS services.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory and serves to manage the publication of data layers for TerraBrasilis databases.

templates.name: webapps
templates.title: The WebMap and deforestation-dashboard Apps for production
templates.description: The TerraBrasilis WebMap is the main component of the Web GUIs for explore our maps using the OGC services. The dashboard is the main component Web GUI for explore the deforestation data analytics produced by PRODES.
templates.note: This stack are mandatory and responds by the Map and Deforestation-dashboard URLs for production use.

templates.name: homepage
templates.title: The home page as an entry point to the site
templates.description: The home page of TerraBrasilis based on Wordpress. It is the gateway to all TerraBrasilis resources.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory and responds by the root URL.

templates.name: sgdbs
templates.title: The SGDBs stack with relational SQL and NoSQL databases.
templates.description: The main stack with document databases and relational databases.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory to support some Applications and services stacks.

templates.name: homologation-webapps
templates.title: The Apps Stack for homologation
templates.note: This stack are optional for homologation use.

templates.name: homologation-sgdbs
templates.title: The homologation SGDBs stack with relational SQL and NoSQL databases.
templates.note: This stack are optional for homologation use.

templates.name: homologation-apis
templates.title: Homologation backend APIs.
templates.note: This stack are optional for homologation use.

templates.name: homologation-background-tasks
templates.title: Homologation background tasks
templates.description: A collection of services as Homologation background tasks.
templates.note: This stack are optional for homologation use.
